constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 46 (Thursday, March 11, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. ROSENDALE:
H.R. 1851.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
The constitutional authority on which this bill rests is
the power of Congress to lay and collect taxes as enumerated
in Article 1, Section 8, Clause 1 of the United States
Constitution.
[Page H1358]

sponsors.fullName: Rep. Rosendale Sr., Matthew M. [R-MT-At Large]

title: St. Mary's Reinvestment Act
